script: Didi? Didi! Xingxing didi, xinglai!!
leader_direction=S++walk=student_2__E2
leader_direction=N++walk=student_2__S2E2
Aiyanna__Mei-Hua, I don't think--
leader_direction=S++walk=student_2__N1
leader_direction=N++walk=student_2__S1
Shut up! Didi, Xinglai, xinglai, XINGLAI!
Bubba Renald__Mei-Hua. ...I'm sorry.
Jin-Shi...
leader_direction=S++walk=student_2__S1
leader_direction=N++walk=student_2__N1
Bubba Renald__...I'll fetch a monk to handle the body.
leader_direction=S++walk=bubba_renald__S2
Bubba Renald__Kind faithful. If it pleases you, I'd ask you not to bother her right now. As you can see, something traumatic has happened here.
Bubba Renald__Perhaps Bubba Dmitri, or Archmage Imedes, could entertain you if you wish to see miracles at work more properly.
walk=bubba_renald__S5
(She doesn't seem to notice you.)
(She doesn't seem to notice you.)
Um... hello? Uh, no habla Alteni? --n Wait a second. That height. That grumpy stare. You're that faithful! Just where have you been? I've been working by myself the past four days!
And why are you dressed like that? This is no time for joking around! Now did you find anything on the *shady* *guy* or didn't you!?
There you are! Where you been these four days!? I work all alone and find nothing! Did you find *shady* *guy*?
You ready now? We go *face* Bubba Renald?
Wait, you did? Do we know where he is? Do we know who he is? Tell me his name! *Show* me how!
I am disciple of *Prometus*. I learn prayers and miracles, and live my life the way He believes is best. Once I become a *wizard*, I
FOCUS!

Bubba... Bubba Renald? --n Please, please kind faithful, tell me this is joke. Jin-Shi was not best student, but he was not slacking or rude. Bubba Renald only show up recently. He would have no reason to hate him.
But then... you really mean it, yes?
clothing_montage++Yesterday, he see me crying during grammar lecture. He... he tell everyone else to leave. He hug me...
I will be OK. Once he pays. --n We go now? We go and *face* him?
Bubba... Bubba Renald? --n ...No. No, you lie. Bubba Renald is kind. He treats me and other disciples well. And Jin-Shi, he--
...Proof.
You show proof! Why you think Bubba Renald would kill my brother?
I know. He gave my brother the book. We go to *face* him?
What is this? A prayer tome? --n ...Dan biaoti cuole... Didi na benshu biaoti ye cuole ma? Shuli de wenzi kanqilai--
Jiu shizhege! Qingkan zheli! Di shiqi yeshang xiedao--

...Sorry. Look at page seventeen! It does not say alem heat, it says maniret fire! Wear Fire! Faithful, you did it! You really did it! You find... --n ...You find why my brother die. Someone sell him book with wrong prayer.
Who, kind faithful. Who kill my brother?
A... a prayer tome? Zheyu renheshi... --n ...Bu.
...You lie.
Please, please kind faithful. Say you lie.
This book. Page seventeen, alem heat replaced with maniret fire. Wear Fire prayer. This book was made to kill whoever try to use it.
clothing_montage++Yesterday, he see me crying during grammar lecture. He... he tell everyone else to leave. He hug me...
I will be OK. Once he pays. --n We go now? We go and *face* him?
I know. Bubba Renald gave it to you. We go to *face* him?
Thank you, kind faithful.
start_event=confronting_renald
You need to prepare? You believe things will be that bad?
...OK. But please, hurry.
conditions: last_dialog=renald|show disciple text to spreading miracles of prometus

script: Oh, Forel, thank you so much for what you did! My brother is avenged!
And don't worry, I don't believe a word of what he says. I don't care if you are a bastard, and a man as nice as you cannot be *picky*.
My job is talking to you.
Do you not know that word? Faithful really are kept sheltered. --n Um, well, I am not so good at Promen, but I try to explain.
Picky means... you only like man or woman. It is a man or woman who only ever cares about one.
They do not care about family or xingge, ah, personality, only sex. They would spit in the Sydan's face if not picky for him.
They say you cannot keep children around them, even their own. If they are what they are picky for, they take them. If not, they kill them.
But again, I know you are not picky. Only loving the Sydan just means you are loyal, yes?
I... what? You... you are picky?
change_object_state=student_3#after_fight__mei_hua_scared
I need to go...
walk=student_3#after_fight__N7--30
Exactly!
